snippet: The decision by the Seattle Seahawks to throw the ball on second-and-goal from the 1-yard line joins an ignominious list of the worst coaching decisions in sports history.
abstract: Seattle Seahawks decision to pass rather than run with ball in final minute of Super Bowl will be remembered as one of worst coaching decisions in professional sports; other famous coaching blunders noted.
lead_paragraph: The decision by the Seattle Seahawks to throw the ball on second-and-goal from the 1-yard line joins an ignominious list of the worst coaching decisions in sports history.

headline.main: Seahawks’ Call Joins List of Big Gaffes in Sports
headline.print_headline: Seattle’s Call Joins List of Big Gaffes in Sports
